properties.Name: Sonyathi Sewing Club
properties.Activity: Our organization provided women with sewing machines, enabling them to create and sell school uniforms. This initiative has diversified their income sources and enhanced their ability to withstand the impacts of climate change. Empowered, these women are now agents of change in their community

properties.Name: Dopota Sewing Club
properties.Activity: The organization has facilitated the establishment of a sewing club for women in the Dopota community, providing them with sewing machines to produce school uniforms. Additionally, the women engage in basket weaving. The organization plays a crucial role in connecting the group with markets both within Zimbabwe and internationally, thereby enhancing their economic opportunities and resilience against climate change impacts
